t: Amazon Freevee - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Amazon Freevee (stylized as freevee and fv, also shortened as Freevee, formerly known as IMDb Freedive and IMDb TV, and sometimes spelled FV) is an American ad-supported video-on-demand (VOD) streaming service owned by Amazon, with original and licensed programming.

t: Amazon Is Shutting Down Freevee, Its Ad-Supported Video Streamer
s: November 12, 2024 - Freevee is the name of the ad-supported video on demand (AVOD) service that was originally launched in January 2019 under the name IMDb Freedive and then rebranded as IMDb TV in June of that year. Freevee has been housed within the Amazon MGM Studios group.

t: IMDb TV rebrands to Amazon Freevee as it celebrates rapid growth
s: Formerly known as IMDb TV, Freevee is a free video on demand or streaming service owned by Amazon. Freevee features more than 9,000 original and licensed titles from Warner Bros., Sony Pictures Entertainment, MGM Studio, and Universal Pictures.

t: What Is Amazon Freevee? - Amazon Customer Service

t: Amazon to close Freevee streaming service
s: November 14, 2024 - Amazon is to shut its ad-supported streaming service Freevee after five years. Content from the platform will move to the Prime Video brand. s: September 18, 2023 - One of the biggest free streaming ... has been Amazon Freevee, which is known as a FAST service (Free Ad-Supported streaming Television).
